thread.title: Anthony Martial to quit Manchester United for PSG this summer after ‘falling out with Jose Mourinho’

author: fnathan
title: Anthony Martial to quit Manchester United for PSG this summer after ‘falling out with Jose Mourinho’
text:
s-mart move Anthony Martial to quit Manchester United for PSG this summer after ‘falling out with Jose Mourinho’ 
Frenchman believes Jose Mourinho is using him as a scapegoat for when things go wrong at Old Trafford and is attempting to force him out By Fred Nathan
